original_text: The crowd of people in the meeting place continued to shout loudly. Some people were shouting one thing and other people were shouting something different. Not many of the people even knew why they had all met together.
korean_text: 사람들이 외쳐 어떤 이는 이런 말을, 어떤 이는 저런 말을 하니 모인 무리가 분란하여 태반이나 어찌하여 모였는지 알지 못하더라

sentences.original_text: The crowd of people in the meeting place
Some people were shouting one thing
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 한 가지를 외치고 있었고

sentences.original_text: and other people were shouting something different.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람들은 다른 것을 외치고 있었다.

sentences.original_text: even knew why they had all met together.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜 그들이 모두 함께 모였는지조차 알지 못했다.
